pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, November 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, November 20, 2016:

Lima, Peru

7:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Malcolm Turnbull, Prime Minister of Australia 

Belmond Hotel
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the APEC Leaders’ Arrival Official Photograph  

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Leaders’ Retreat I

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Leaders’ Working Luncheon

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Closed to media


2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Leaders’ Retreat II

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Adjourning Ceremony

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Closed to media


6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a media availability

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Open for coverage


9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa

Note for media:

  • Closed to media


Note: All times are local

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
